Hello,

Your account appears to have exhibited automated behavior that violates the Twitter Rules: https://support.twitter.com/articles/18311.

In order to continue safely using Twitter, please follow these steps:
Log in to your account on the web or open your Twitter app (iOS or Android).
Youâ€™ll see a prompt letting you know your account has been locked. Click or tap â€œStartâ€.
Select your country/region from the drop down menu, and then enter your phone number.
Click â€œSend codeâ€ and Twitter will send you a text message with a confirmation code (note that your standard message rates may apply).
Enter the code you received in the â€œYour codeâ€ box and click â€œSubmitâ€.
You will see a confirmation message that your account is now unlocked.
Once you confirm your identity, it may take up to a few minutes for your account to be unlocked.

If youâ€™re still experiencing an issue after confirming your identity, please reply to this message and provide us with specific details of the problem you're experiencing. Weâ€™ll do our best to help!

Thanks,

Twitter Support
